title: Yogurt Parfait Recipe
description: This yogurt parfait is made by simply layering vanilla yogurt, granola and fruit in a glass. A delicious and beautiful beginning to your day!
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Breakfast and Brunch Cereals Granola Recipes Yogurt Parfait 4.6 (72) 58 Reviews 38 Photos This yogurt parfait recipe makes a delicious breakfast, snack, or dessert! It looks great in a glass, but can also be made in a bowl. Use your favorite fruit, or whatever is in season. Submitted by Natalie Updated on August 28, 2022 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 38 38 38 38 Prep Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 2 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 2 servings 2 cups vanilla yogurt 1 cup granola 8 blackberries Directions Layer 1 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup granola, and 4 blackberries in a large glass; repeat layers. I Made It Print 209 home cooks made it! name: Natalie
instructions: Layer 1 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup granola, and 4 blackberries in a large glass; repeat layers.
